SEARCH
Package com.dua3.utility.text

Class RichTextBuilder

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.text.RichTextBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
ToRichText, Appendable, CharSequence
public class RichTextBuilder extends Object implements Appendable, ToRichText, CharSequence
A builder class for rich text data.

A rich text is created by appending strings to the builder using the append(CharSequence).

Attributes can be set manipulated by using push(String, Object)/pop(String), push(Style)/pop(Style) or compose(String, BiFunction)/decompose(String) pairs of methods.

    • deleteCharAt

      public RichTextBuilder deleteCharAt(int index)
      Deletes the character at the specified index in the text being built and updates internal structures to maintain the consistency of text positions and attributes.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the character to delete, starting from 0; must be within the range of the current text
      Returns:
      this RichTextBuilder instance after the specified character has been deleted

    • push

      public RichTextBuilder push(String name, Object value)
      Push attribute. Remove the attribute again by calling pop(String).

      If the attribute is already present, its value is overwritten.

      Parameters:
      name - attribute name
      value - attribute value
      Returns:
      this RichTextBuilder instance

    • pop

      public RichTextBuilder pop(String name)
      Pop attribute that has been set using push(String, Object).

      The value the attribute had before calling {push()} is restored; if the attribute was created new, it is removed.

      Parameters:
      name - attribute name
      Returns:
      this instance

      Compose new attribute value. Remove the attribute again by calling decompose(String).
      Parameters:
      name - attribute name
      composer - function that computes the new value from the current value
      Returns:
      this RichTextBuilder instance

    • decompose

      public RichTextBuilder decompose(String name)

      Parameters:
      name - attribute name
      Returns:
      this RichTextBuilder instance
